languages.text: "На миссии будут следующие позывные для связи по воксу: вы — ВТ-1, я — ДК-1. Также попрошу вас использовать язык жестов арбитес. Невербальные команды быстрее слов и позволяют застать врасплох противника. Короткий список здесь". {n}Соломон протягивает вам инфопластину.{/n}

"The following call signs will be used for vox-communication during the mission: you will be RT-1, and I will be DX-1. I also request you use Arbites sign language throughout. Non-verbal commands are faster than speaking and will allow us to catch our target unawares. Here is a short list." {n}Solomorne holds out a data-slate to you.{/n}
languages.original_text: "На миссии будут следующие позывные для связи по воксу: вы — ВТ-1, я — ДК-1. Также попрошу вас использовать язык жестов арбитес. Невербальные команды быстрее слов и позволяют застать врасплох противника. Короткий список здесь". {n}Соломон протягивает вам инфопластину.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The following call signs will be used for vox communication during the mission: you will be RT-1, and I will be SA-80. I also request that you use Arbites sign language throughout. Non-verbal commands are faster than speaking and will allow us to catch our target unawares. Here is a short list." {n}Solomorne holds out a data-slate to you.{/n}

"The following call signs will be used for vox communication during the mission: you will be RT-1, and I will be SA-80. I also request that you use Arbites sign language throughout. "The following call signs will be used for vox-communication during the mission: you will be RT-1, and I will be DX-1. I also request you use Arbites sign language throughout. Non-verbal commands are faster than speaking and will allow us to catch our target unawares. Here is a short list." {n}Solomorne holds out a data-slate to you.{/n}

"The following call signs will be used for vox-communication during the mission: you will be RT-1, and I will be DX-1. I also request you use Arbites sign language throughout. Non-verbal commands are faster than speaking and will allow us to catch our target unawares. Here is a short list." {n}Solomorne holds out a data-slate to you.{/n}

languages.text: «Usaremos los siguientes códigos en la comunicación por voco durante la misión: usted será RT-1 y yo seré DX-1. También solicito que utilice el lenguaje de signos del Arbites en la operación. Las señales no verbales son más rápidas que las palabras y nos permitirán sorprender al objetivo. Aquí tiene una breve lista». {n}Solomorne te extiende una tablilla de datos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The following call signs will be used for vox-communication during the mission: you will be RT-1, and I will be DX-1. I also request you use Arbites sign language throughout. Non-verbal commands are faster than speaking and will allow us to catch our target unawares. Here is a short list." {n}Solomorne holds out a data-slate to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Usaremos los siguientes códigos en la comunicación por voco durante la misión: usted será RT-1 y yo seré SA-80. También solicito que utilice el lenguaje de signos del Arbites en la operación. Las señales no verbales son más rápidas que las palabras y nos permitirán sorprender al objetivo. Aquí tiene una breve lista». {n}Solomorne te extiende una tablilla de datos.{/n}

languages.text: “行动期间，进行音阵通讯时要使用代号。你是RT-1，我是DX-1。除此之外，我还要求你的人全程使用法务部的战术手势，因为手势比说话更快，可以打敌人个措手不及。这里有一份简短的清单。”{n}索罗蒙递给了你一块数据板。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The following call signs will be used for vox-communication during the mission: you will be RT-1, and I will be DX-1. I also request you use Arbites sign language throughout. Non-verbal commands are faster than speaking and will allow us to catch our target unawares. Here is a short list." {n}Solomorne holds out a data-slate to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “行动期间，进行音阵通讯时要使用代号。你是RT-1，我是SA-80。除此之外，我还要求你的人全程使用法务部的战术手势，因为手势比说话更快，可以打敌人个措手不及。这里有一份简短的清单。”{n}索罗蒙递给了你一块数据板。{/n}

languages.text: « Les noms de code suivants seront utilisés pour les communications-vox en cours de mission : vous serez LM-1 et moi, DX-1. Je vous invite également à communiquer exclusivement au moyen de la langue des signes de l'Arbites. Outre leur avantage en termes de rapidité, les commandes non verbales nous permettront de surprendre notre cible. En voici une liste abrégée. » {n}Solomorne vous tend une plaque de données.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The following call signs will be used for vox-communication during the mission: you will be RT-1, and I will be DX-1. I also request you use Arbites sign language throughout. Non-verbal commands are faster than speaking and will allow us to catch our target unawares. Here is a short list." {n}Solomorne holds out a data-slate to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Les noms de code suivants seront utilisés pour les communications-vox en cours de mission : vous serez LM-1 et moi, SA-80. Je vous invite également à communiquer exclusivement au moyen de la langue des signes de l'Arbites. Outre leur avantage en termes de rapidité, les commandes non verbales nous permettront de surprendre notre cible. En voici une liste abrégée. » {n}Solomorne vous tend une plaque de données.{/n}

languages.text: 「ミッション中のヴォックス通信には以下の呼出符号を使用します。あなたはRT-1で、私はDX-1です。また、アルビテス手話を通してコミュニケーションを取ることをお願いしたいと思います。非言語的指示は話すよりも速く、ターゲットを不意打ちすることができます。こちらに簡単なリストがあります」{n}ソロモーンは、あなたにデータスレートを差し出す。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The following call signs will be used for vox-communication during the mission: you will be RT-1, and I will be DX-1. I also request you use Arbites sign language throughout. Non-verbal commands are faster than speaking and will allow us to catch our target unawares. Here is a short list." {n}Solomorne holds out a data-slate to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ミッション中のヴォックス通信には以下の呼出符号を使用します。あなたはRT-1で、私はSA-80です。また、アルビテス手話を通してコミュニケーションを取ることをお願いしたいと思います。非言語的指示は話すよりも速く、ターゲットを不意打ちすることができます。こちらに簡単なリストがあります」{n}ソロモーンは、あなたにデータスレートを差し出す。{/n}

languages.text: "Görev sırasında sesli iletişim için şu kod adlarını kullanacağız: Siz HT-1 olacaksınız, ben de DX-1 olacağım. Ayrıca görev süresince Arbites işaret dilini kullanmanızı rica ediyorum. Sözsüz komutlar, sözcüklerden daha hızlı ifade edilir. Ayrıca hedefimizi gafil avlamamızı sağlayacaklar. Komutların kısa bir listesini buyurun." {n}Solomorne, sana bir databela uzatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The following call signs will be used for vox-communication during the mission: you will be RT-1, and I will be DX-1. I also request you use Arbites sign language throughout. Non-verbal commands are faster than speaking and will allow us to catch our target unawares. Here is a short list." {n}Solomorne holds out a data-slate to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Görev sırasında sesli iletişim için şu kod adlarını kullanacağız: Siz HT-1 olacaksınız, ben de SA-80 olacağım. Ayrıca görev süresince Arbites işaret dilini kullanmanızı rica ediyorum. Sözsüz komutlar, sözcüklerden daha hızlı ifade edilir. Ayrıca hedefimizi gafil avlamamızı sağlayacaklar. Komutların kısa bir listesini buyurun." {n}Solomorne, sana bir databela uzatıyor.{/n}

languages.text: "Wir werden für unsere Vox-Kommunikation im Rahmen der Mission folgende Rufzeichenverwenden: Ihr seid RT-1, ich werde DX-1 sein. Außerdem bitte ich Euch, die Zeichensprache der Arbitratoren zu verwenden. Non-verbale Kommandos sind schneller und ermöglichen uns, das Ziel zu überraschen. Hier ist eine kurze Liste." {n}Solomorne reicht dir einen Datablock.{/n}
